overview: “What nobody talks about” is an honest, heartfelt story about a reality experienced by many, yet unknown or barely talked about. Karoline is a 28 year old police officer who´s been fighting cancer for a year. Finally, she is announced cancer free and that means she can go back to her normal, everyday life. She is so excited for the next chapter. Everything’s gonna be better now! Right?
title: What Nobody Talks About
